location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from [Charles Umpherston Aitchison], Gorton Castle, Simla to Sir Lewis Pelly, KCSI, Agent for Governor General Rajpootana [Rājasthān]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's retinue; an outbreak of cholera in Simla; and Aitchison's plans for returning to England.The letter itself is missing the last folio(s) including the signature of the author, who has been identified through his handwriting as Charles Umpherston Aitchison.
